message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm starting the negotiation at $1,500,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's as high as I can go.
Bob, thanks for your counter. I understand your perspective, but $800,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,200,000?
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not willing to go above $900,000. I'm willing to compromise, but I think that's the highest I can go.
